description: Password vault web application running on localhost port 80. Application is titled "AUTH 06" and presents as "Springfield's Vault" with Simpsons theme. Built with Apache 2.4.25 and PHP 5.6.40. Single-page application with password authentication mechanism that validates input by computing MD5 hashes.

endpoints: /index.php (POST) - Processes password submission, returns status 200 with MD5 hash display
/ (POST) - Processes password submission, returns status 200 with MD5 hash display

notes: Application running on PHP 5.6.40 (end-of-life since January 2019, known security vulnerabilities). Uses MD5 for password hashing/comparison which is cryptographically weak. Single endpoint structure suggests all functionality behind password authentication. Testing reveals MD5 comparison is shown in response (e.g., 'Incorrect Vault Password: 098f6bcd4621d373cade4e832627b4f6'). No API endpoints, API documentation, or alternate interfaces discovered. Static directory (/static/) accessible via direct file request (springfield_background.jpg returns 200) but directory listing forbidden (403). .htaccess file exists but not readable (403). Application indicates sensitive password/record storage functionality once authenticated.
